author: gdaniels
msg: * Make AxisFault put the stack trace correctly into a <stacktrace>
* Move serializing DOM elements into the SerializationContext itself,
so it's more useful from outside MessageElement.
* Don't set the Debug level from the properties file value if it's already
been specified on the command line.
* Add constant QNames for the fault elements so we don't create them
* Flesh out example 4 for the user's guide

author: gdaniels
msg: Start of improvements to AxisFault, add getBasePath() to AxisServer,
latest doc edits, and change setOutputParam() to setOutputType() in

author: rubys
msg: Ensure that the message context is set when a message is replaced.

author: gdaniels
msg: Point to Nagoya, don't print stack trace on error.
